trends: There have been 134 other sightings in Kansas City
There were no other sightings in Kansas City on or around January 31st 2010
divs: Sighting DetailsWas looking south in back yard, saw something out of corner of eye. As I looked west, saw a bluish-white light streak from high in sky toward the west. It only lasted a few seconds before it disappeared from view, behind the house next to ours. At first I though it was a shooting star, but the skies are overcast, so it had to be low enough to be passing through clouds. When it happened, I actually thought that it was going to hit the ground far off and I waited for an explosion or rumble, but never heard anything.
Summary: Bright bluish-white circle of light streaked toward west and looked like it would crash into ground
